ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
MCP UI Server is a Python SDK for creating MCP UI resources on the server side,
enabling rich interactive experiences in MCP applications. It provides tools
for delivering dynamic UI components directly from your MCP server to be
rendered by clients.
about.summary: A Python SDK for creating MCP UI resources on the server side

about.description:
MCP UI Server is a Python SDK for creating MCP UI resources on the server side,
enabling rich interactive experiences in MCP applications. It provides tools
for delivering dynamic UI components directly from your MCP server to be
rendered by clients.
about.summary: A Python SDK for creating MCP UI resources on the server side

name: mcp-ui-server
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "mcp-ui-server" %}
{% set version = "1.0.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/mcp_ui_server-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 5ab8f17b93bf794966af7c35e9a575e4f21a9ba2bab3d316cfc107a15f88a3c9

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - hatchling
    - pip
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - mcp >=1.0.0
    - pydantic >=2.0.0
    - typing_extensions >=4.0.0

test:
  imports:
    - mcp_ui_server
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://mcpui.dev
  summary: A Python SDK for creating MCP UI resources on the server side
  description: |
    MCP UI Server is a Python SDK for creating MCP UI resources on the server side,
    enabling rich interactive experiences in MCP applications. It provides tools
    for delivering dynamic UI components directly from your MCP server to be
    rendered by clients.
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  dev_url: https://github.com/MCP-UI-Org/mcp-ui
  doc_url: https://mcpui.dev/guide/introduction

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - rxm7706
